product_name: MILK MAKEUP Glow Oil Lip + Cheek
user_specs: ['Eye Color Hazel', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Fair', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content: Like others have said, it’s great for bare skin days. This shade is very sheer and looks amazing in the summer because it has a fine pink shimmer to it. I knocked a point off because it has an awful chemical taste so I can only use it on my cheeks.

product_name: MILK MAKEUP Glow Oil Lip + Cheek
user_specs: ['Eye Color Blue', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Fair', 'Skin Type Normal']
review_title: This is the smallest product I have ever purchased
review_content: When I got this, I had to double check that I had not received some travel size option that I had not intended to. Nope, this is the "full size". It is literally the smallest product I have ever spent money on. The product itself seems decent but it's really not worth $20 for this toy sized amount. Spend your money on a different full sized product.

product_name: MILK MAKEUP Glow Oil Lip + Cheek
user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Black', 'Skin Tone Porcelain', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content: looks great on bare skin and leaves it looking dewy and adds some color. I wouldn’t use this as an everyday blush just because it’s not that long wearing and it’s small. But it’s great for good skin days and the colors are great for summer. May not be best for dark skin.

product_name: MILK MAKEUP Glow Oil Lip + Cheek
user_specs: ['Eye Color Blue', 'Hair color Blonde', 'Skin Tone Light', 'Skin Type Oily']
review_content: I got this in a set last Christmas. I twisted it up half way and it wouldn’t go back down! I had to cut off the product and put it in a little tin because the packaging broke!!! It has little glitters in it that don’t look great on the skin. It is very sheer and doesn’t look very good on my skin. I don’t recommend and it’s not worth your money.

product_name: MILK MAKEUP Glow Oil Lip + Cheek
user_specs: ['Eye Color Gray', 'Hair color Blonde', 'Skin Tone Light', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content: don’t listen to the other reviews it stays on clean skin or on top of makeup. It’s gorgeous, only problem is drys your lips out so I suggest just putting it on your cheeks.

product_name: MILK MAKEUP Glow Oil Lip + Cheek

product_name: MILK MAKEUP Glow Oil Lip + Cheek

product_name: MILK MAKEUP Glow Oil Lip + Cheek

product_name: MILK MAKEUP Glow Oil Lip + Cheek
user_specs: ['Eye Color Green', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Light', 'Skin Type Dry']

product_name: MILK MAKEUP Glow Oil Lip + Cheek
user_specs: ['Eye Color Green', 'Hair color Blonde', 'Skin Tone Light', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content:
I received this product in the shade glimmer in a boxy charm premium box. Wow the product is tiny, I would definitely not call this full-size, I would call a deluxe size or a travel size. But with that said, I love this product! It gives your cheeks the perfect kiss of sheer color. I will say that it does not Last long, but the product is not claim to be long wearing. I can get about 4 to 6 hours of sheer wear on my cheeks. I love that it makes the cheeks look plump and healthy, it also gives a sheen to them, you almost don’t need a highlight. I’m now buying all of the other shades available. I wish it came in a larger size.

product_name: MILK MAKEUP Glow Oil Lip + Cheek

Blends out pretty well and the texture is different than other cream blushes, so the sheen makes my me look almost more awake somehow. My only grip with this product is how tiny this product is. This pink is a bit too bright for me, hence missing a star (but hey, it’s subjective), but when I use on top or under the rose color Glow Oil ON MY LIPS, it actually looks nice. As with many lip colors, it does not appear to cause my lips to chap - though I always use lip moisturizer when I lie down for sleep. I was nervous about my cheeks breaking out and have not had that issue, either. There is no discernible smell or taste, which I suppose is good (though I’d kind of enjoy a fruity smell and taste). product_name: MILK MAKEUP Glow Oil Lip + Cheek
user_specs: ['Eye Color Hazel', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Medium', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content:
I enjoy this product only for little to no makeup days. I really like how it gives color and makes you look glowing at once. I deducted one star because the bullet arrived a bit smushed but still usable. Glimmer seems to have pink reflects in it but they do not show up as specks of glitter. The color is much more pink in person than compared to this image. You don’t need very much so I feel as though this will last a while. I don’t recommend swiping it directly on the face it works much better when you warm it up on your fingers and apply with your fingers.

product_name: MILK MAKEUP Glow Oil Lip + Cheek
user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Medium', 'Skin Type Combination']

Even though it’s a small package they’ll last a while because you don’t need much. Although it’s called glow oil it really doesn’t feel like an oil, but more of a cream blush.

review_title: i love love love! stocking up on them

product_name: MILK MAKEUP Glow Oil Lip + Cheek
user_specs: ['Eye Color Hazel', 'Hair color Blonde', 'Skin Tone Light', 'Skin Type Oily']
review_title: Gorgeous glow but HELLO tiny bumps all over cheeks
review_content:
They are honestly stunning when you dab them on top of a cheek stain or a muted blush! On their own they are OK..not super pigmented, more of a light flush of color. The consistency is also very thick and vaseline-like. Overall, I absolutely loved the color and the glowy effect it gave me on my cheeks, HOWEVER, I broke out so bad on my cheeks where I placed them (4-6 tiny bumps on each side). Just be aware of that before you buy!!! It really pains me because I loved them, but its a strong NO for me because of this. :(

product_name: MILK MAKEUP Glow Oil Lip + Cheek

product_name: MILK MAKEUP Glow Oil Lip + Cheek
user_specs: ['Age 25-34', 'Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Porcelain', 'Skin Type Normal']
review_title: Beautiful tinted glow, but it's not coral
review_content:
The product itself is very lovely. I appreciate a sheer tinted product, especially in the summer. I have extremely pale skin so this actually gives me quite a bit of colour if I want it to. The convenience of a stick format is nice, and I can apply it either straight from the tube or with fingers/sponge -- either way works and blends well. I do find it feels slightly tacky on the skin and because of this, it can transfer. However, my biggest gripe is that the colour I bought, Flare, is NOT as pictured. Though it's a very lovely colour, it's basically just pink in the tube and pink on the skin. There's zero orange, and that's kind of why I bought it. So I like the product, but I am definitely a bit disappointed with the colour.

For those of you who prefer cream type products over powder and like that fresh glow look on your cheeks, then you'll love this product. I know it says it's an oil, but don't let that scare you. Not oily in the least. it's like a cream in a stick. It's small but it'll last you a long time. The colour payoff is very nice. It does add a nice glow to your cheeks. Easy applies, can use your fingers to go as subtle or more bold as you like. The price is on point.

product_name: MILK MAKEUP Glow Oil Lip + Cheek
user_specs: ['Hair color Blonde', 'Skin Tone Fair', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content:
All I can say is WOW! I bought this before I went on vacation, and not only was it perfect for light makeup days, when I came back from vacation, my coworkers commented on my "sunkissed skin"... but little do they know it was actually just this on my skin. I was a little surprised by the small size, but I've been using it for over a month every day and have not even made a dent in it - so I think it will last for a long time. This stays all day, gives you the most natural-looking blush (or exaggerated blush, if you want to build it up), and is perfect for summer. Plays well with all my foundations, or even on my bare skin. Can look dewy or matte depending on setting powder used. If you're debating - buy it!!! You won't be disappointed!

product_name: MILK MAKEUP Glow Oil Lip + Cheek

review_content:
I found this product at the cash section and it was the last one, and I'm so glad I did! I'm obsessed with this! I wore it today through 33 degree celsius weather where I was sweating and it also stayed perfectly in place through walking in the rain. It was so sticky and humid and gross outside and I always wipe all of my makeup off by touching my face, but this didn't budge. It stayed on for a total of 13 hours! product_name: MILK MAKEUP Glow Oil Lip + Cheek
